nodes.bodyText: Please, provide a description of what do you check here and what is the expected behavior
Looks ok for me, but we should make sure with Scott what is the expected error message from the COBOL programmer point of view. It may be changed later on.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,7 @@ CobolVisitor.declarativeSameMsg=The following token cannot be on the same line a
 CobolVisitor.invalidDefMsg=Invalid definition for: %s
 CobolVisitor.misspelledWord=A misspelled word, maybe you want to put %s
 CobolVisitor.progIDIssueMsg=There is an issue with PROGRAM-ID paragraph
+CobolVisitor.paragraphNotDefined=The following paragraph is not defined: %s

nodes.bodyText: Ok, will work for now. We will change the paragraph context to accept localities later on, altogether with the same late check for variables.
A section is not a paragraph, it should not be consumed here
